title: FontLab measurement line vanish…
content:
After spendig months on a new typeface family – the measurement line suddenly disappears from the FontLab .vfb-file even though its activated. What is wrong? The other .vfb-files seem to be intact. May it perhaps be a bug? I use FontLab 5.0.2 on a Mac running ‘Tiger’.

Please, help me  
KTKM
author: Kristian M

comments.content:
I’ve also had this problem. It seems to happen if you are creating outlines with many nodes, like in a rough script or ‘texture’. (I found) It doesn’t happen if outlines are simple.

Nick Cooke

Me too. Can´t pinpoint when it´s happening but it´s a bug for sure..  
I take the file into FL 4 and then back again to 5, to solve the problem.

Tips and tricks.

in the Edit Macro panel write:

fl.font.measurement = 50  
fl.UpdateFont(-1)

and click on the Run macro button.

Will that help?

Regards,  
Johnych

fl.font.measurement = 50
fl.UpdateFont(-1) It works! Thank you all for the great input – and thank you very much Johnych for the nifty Macro. KTKM

This Macro was first introduced by Adam Twardoch some time ago.  
So thanks to Adam. :)

Regards,  
Johnych
